thread.title: Egypt: Irrigation Minister Lauds Sudan Efforts for Solutions Regarding Ethiopia's Dam
thread.title_full: Egypt: Irrigation Minister Lauds Sudan Efforts for Solutions Regarding Ethiopia's Dam

title: Egypt: Irrigation Minister Lauds Sudan Efforts for Solutions Regarding Ethiopia's Dam
text:
An updated technical offer should be submitted by the French consultancy office by August 15 maximum, the minister said. 
The offer should then be separately studied by the three countries, he said. 
The office should determine the cost of the study and the time needed for it to conduct financial and environmental studies on the impact of the water storage process on the two downstream countries, the minister said. The two studies should take no longer than 11 months, he noted. 
The environmental research should include economic and social studies, Moghazi added. Egypt
